items.sentence: It looks like this is the first time Tom has ever done this.
I've been in and out of the hospital for the past few years.
How can we achieve a balance between work and personal life?
I really wonder how much the inheritance tax will amount to.
This summer resort is no longer as popular as it used to be.
How much time do adults spend watching television every day?
You wouldn't say that if you knew what Tom has been through.
Tom sat down, slipped off his shoes, and took off his socks.
We're not going to have an office Christmas party this year.
Tom says that he doesn't think it'll be possible to do that.
